Layer.Text: Not for sale. You must legally own the songs used.

Layer.OnCommand: %function(self) self:x(SCREEN_RIGHT-5) self:y(SCREEN_TOP+5) self:horizalign('right') self:vertalign('top') self:zoom(0.4); self:shadowlength(2); self:settext('V'.. DWIVersion() ..'\nRecreation of V2.50.00 (Aug 14, 2003)') self:sleep(5) self:diffusealpha(0) end

Layer.PlaySoundCommand: %function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/attract/attract-00') ) end end
%function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/attract/attract-01') ) end end
%function(self) local Pr = PROFILEMAN:GetMachineProfile():GetSaved() if Pr.DWIAnnouncer then SOUND:PlayOnce( THEME:GetPath( EC_SOUNDS, '', 'Internal/attract/attract-02') ) end end
